body.name: Sweetcrispy Office Computer Desk Chair, Ergonomic Low-Back Mesh Rolling Work Swivel Chairs with Wheels, Armless Comfortable Seat Lumbar Support for Home,Bedroom,Study,Student,Adults, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 43 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Sturdy Desk Chair with Wheels】 Small desk chair with thick foam cushion, durable chair base, sturdy gas lift, and PU silent casters; suitable for hard floors, carpets, and other floorings. All components of this chair are of good quality and come from reliable suppliers. The BIFMA Certified sturdy base is tested over 10000 times to ensure your safety when you sit on our armless desk chair. Such small desk chairs are perfect for small spaces, space-saving yet sturdy!

【Comfortable Armless Office Chair】 No armrests, no limits, flexible and space-saving, the chair is suitable for kids and teens and is also friendly to adults. This low-back small office chair with a foam molded seat can also be a task chair. Besides, this armless office chair has a mesh back for the most comfort. The advanced armless office chair with an ergonomic design will bring you a first-class sitting experience.

【Removable & Adjustable Desk Chair】The armless office chair with a gas lift allows you to raise and lower your seat to the height you need. The removable seat cushion of the small office desk chair is easy to clean. Armless desk chairs can be adjusted from 15.94"-20.67", suiting children and adults for study or office. The chair easily swivels 360 degrees to get the maximum use of your workspace without strain but also keeps you steady when you need to work.

【Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair】The armless office chair with a C-shaped mesh backrest fits the curve of your lower back, and reduces unnecessary pressure on the spine, avoiding back pain. The upgraded Y-shaped armless desk chair provides you with enough support.

【Fast & Easy Assemble】The office chair includes screws, tools, and an installation manual. With only 5 parts, and only takes 4 steps to complete the installation in 10-15 minutes. We aim to offer our customers 100% contentment assurance for our office desk chair. Please don't hesitate to contact our customer service support if you have any questions about the purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Removable Soft Seat Cusion High density resilient sponge seat cusion support long time sit without deformation and can be removed, it is easy to clean! Ergonomic Mesh Back C- shaped backrest fits the curve of your spine, upgraded Y-shaped lumbar support provide you with enough support, diminish unnecessary pressure on spine and reduce back pain. Brethable Mesh The mesh office chair adopt breathable mesh improve the circulation of your backsupport. To avoid sweating, high tempreture during your long time working.

Sturdy Base The home office chair has a reliable height-adjustable gas lift and a 5-star base that can withstand up to 250 pounds. Explosion-proof Gas Lift Our task chair's gas lift which has passed BIFMA standard includes a seat height adjustment feature and can adapt to different user heights. Smooth Castors The 360° swivel castors rolls smoothly on different kinds of floors without scratching the floor. You can easily cross the office to reach a file or talk with your colleague without any noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the table arcade
reviews.reviewText: Small and comfortable. Couldn't beat the price.Well made. Good quality. Easy to put together. Comfortable. Rolls smoothly. Lowers and raises easily.Just as seen in seller photos and as described.Excellent Shipping. Over 5 stars all the way.Fits perfect at our kids table arcade.Hope the photo gives a better view of the size as these do fit their game unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair and value
reviews.reviewText: I have a small work space and needed an armless, yet comfortable seat. This chair is perfect. It holds my big butt with no problem, tucks under the desk out of the way and is comfortable for extended periods of use. I was pleasantly surprised by the beefiness of the frame pieces and it was super easy for this 61yo to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars OK task chair but not for working on all day
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to assemble, and they include a nice "T" wrench. Great price; chair is for small adults or children and comfortable enough for only 1-2 hour max. So it's ok for some tasks but I would not use this for an office chair or study chair where you need it for a full day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed. Easy assembly and comfortable.Not good if your weight is over 200. More for medium sized and small folks and females.I am around 200 and so far so good.I expect I will get another a couple of years out of it and then get another as they are cheap and well designed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: DISCLOSURE: I returned the chair for personal reason -- it is an excellent chair. I ordered the chair to replace my old home office chair. Within hours of placing the order, a friend indicated they had two of these chairs and I was welcome to one. Can't beat free! The chair seats wonderfully, it is firm but not uncomfortable. The coasters are good, not at all difficult to maneuver around in. The chair my friend gave me was still in the box. The assembly was super easy and not at all time consuming. It is the perfect size for my small office area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my small space
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble, came with hardware and instructions, I put it together in minutes. It’s pretty comfortable to sit in, works well in my small space with my small writing desk. All in all I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very worth it
reviews.reviewText: For a good price you get a chair that is quality, comfortable, and easy to put together; installation was a breeze. Would highly recommend for smaller areas. Enjoyed spinning around in it once I put it together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a great chair! It’s small, simple, and easy to assemble. I am 5 foot 11 inches and weigh around 150 lbs. I sit on this chair for school work and I find it suitable for these needs considering its price. I do wish it was a little more cushioned, but you get what you pay for.
